languages.text: "Я, так и быть, заберу жертву незаметно — для остального экипажа она просто... бесследно исчезнет. На корабле довольно потайных уголков... да, и еще кое-что". {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "На это пиршество ты не приглашен{mf||а}. Я сам наслажусь мучениями твоего подношения".

"I will take the victim discreetly — to your crew, one of their number will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."
languages.original_text: "Я, так и быть, заберу жертву незаметно — для остального экипажа она просто... бесследно исчезнет. На корабле довольно потайных уголков... да, и еще кое-что". {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "На это пиршество ты не приглашен{mf||а}. Я сам наслажусь мучениями твоего подношения".

traits.locale_text: "I will take the victim discreetly — for the rest of the crew she will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."

"I will take the victim discreetly — for the rest of the crew she will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."

"I will take the victim discreetly — for the rest of the crew she will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."

"I will take the victim discreetly — for the rest of the crew she will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."

languages.text: “我会神不知鬼不觉地带走我的猎物。对你的船员而言，仅仅是他们之中某个人……消失得无影无踪罢了。这艘船上有很多阴暗的角落……对了，还有一件事情。”{n}玛拉斋眯起了双眼。{/n}“我没有邀请你参加这场盛宴，我要一个人尽情享受你的祭品献给我的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "I will take the victim discreetly — to your crew, one of their number will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."

traits.locale_text: “我会神不知鬼不觉地带走我的猎物。对你的船员而言，仅仅是他们之中某个人……消失得无影无踪罢了。这艘船上有很多阴暗的角落……对了，还有一件事情。”{n}玛拉斋眯起了双眼。{/n}“我没有邀请你参加这场盛宴，我要一个人尽情享受你的祭品献给我的痛苦。”

languages.text: 「俺は獲物を慎重に運ぶ―他のクルーの目には、この女がただ…跡形もなく消えたように映るだろう。この船には暗い隅がたくさんあるのさ…あぁ、あともうひとつ」{n}マラズハイの目が鋭くなる。{/n}「お前はこの宴に招待されていない。お前が捧げたこの苦痛は俺だけで楽しむ」
languages.original_text: "I will take the victim discreetly — for the rest of the crew she will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は獲物を慎重に運ぶ―他のクルーの目には、この女がただ…跡形もなく消えたように映るだろう。この船には暗い隅がたくさんあるのさ…あぁ、あともうひとつ」{n}マラズハイの目が鋭くなる。{/n}「お前はこの宴に招待されていない。お前が捧げたこの苦痛は俺だけで楽しむ」

languages.text: «Me llevaré a mi víctima con discreción; tu tripulación solo sabrá que uno de ellos se ha... esfumado sin dejar rastro. En esta nave hay muchos rincones oscuros... Ah, y una cosa más». {n}Marazhai entorna los ojos.{/n} «Tú no estás {mf|invitado|invitada} a este festín. Solo yo puedo deleitarme con el tormento de tu ofrenda».
languages.original_text: "I will take the victim discreetly — to your crew, one of their number will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."

traits.locale_text: «Me llevaré a mi víctima con discreción; tu tripulación solo sabrá que uno de ellos se ha... esfumado sin dejar rastro. En esta nave hay muchos rincones oscuros... Ah, y una cosa más». {n}Marazhai entorna los ojos.{/n} «Tú no estás {mf|invitado|invitada} a este festín. Solo yo puedo deleitarme con el tormento de tu ofrenda».

«Me llevaré a mi víctima con discreción; para el resto de la tripulación será como si se hubiese... esfumado sin dejar rastro. En esta nave hay muchos rincones oscuros... Ah, y una cosa más». {n}Marazhai entorna los ojos.{/n} «Tú no estás {mf|invitado|invitada} a este festín. Solo yo puedo deleitarme con el tormento de tu ofrenda».

languages.text: « Je la ferai disparaître discrètement. Pour le reste de l'équipage, l'une des leurs se sera simplement... volatilisée sans laisser de trace. Après tout, ce ne sont pas les recoins sombres qui manquent, à bord de ce vaisseau. Oh, une dernière chose, {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} Vous n'êtes pas {mf|invité|invitée} à participer à ce festin. Je me délecterai seul des tourments de votre offrande sacrificielle. »
languages.original_text: "I will take the victim discreetly — to your crew, one of their number will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."

traits.locale_text: « Je la ferai disparaître discrètement. Pour le reste de l'équipage, l'une des leurs se sera simplement... volatilisée sans laisser de trace. Après tout, ce ne sont pas les recoins sombres qui manquent, à bord de ce vaisseau. Oh, une dernière chose, {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} Vous n'êtes pas {mf|invité|invitée} à participer à ce festin. Je me délecterai seul des tourments de votre offrande sacrificielle. »

languages.text: "Ich werde mir das Opfer unauffällig holen – für Eure Crew wird jemand einfach ... spurlos verschwinden. Auf diesem Schiff gibt es viele dunkle Ecken ... Ja, und noch etwas." {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ihr seid zu diesem Festmahl nicht eingeladen. Ich allein werde mich in der Qual Eures Opfers suhlen."
languages.original_text: "I will take the victim discreetly — to your crew, one of their number will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mir das Opfer unauffällig holen – für Eure Crew wird jemand einfach ... spurlos verschwinden. Auf diesem Schiff gibt es viele dunkle Ecken ... Ja, und noch etwas." {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ihr seid zu diesem Festmahl nicht eingeladen. Ich allein werde mich in der Qual Eures Opfers suhlen."

languages.text: "Kurbanı gizlice alacağım. Mürettebata gelirsek... İçlerinden biri, geride iz bile bırakmadan kaybolacak. Bu gemide bol miktarda karanlık köşe var. Ha, bir şey daha..." {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Bu ziyafete sen davetli değilsin. Sunduğun adağın eziyetinin keyfini tek başıma çıkaracağım."
languages.original_text: "I will take the victim discreetly — to your crew, one of their number will simply... vanish without a trace. There are plenty of dark corners on this ship... Yes, and one more thing." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "You are not invited to this feast. I alone will revel in the torment of your offering."

traits.locale_text: "Kurbanı gizlice alacağım. Mürettebata gelirsek... İçlerinden biri, geride iz bile bırakmadan kaybolacak. Bu gemide bol miktarda karanlık köşe var. Ha, bir şey daha..." {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Bu ziyafete sen davetli değilsin. Sunduğun adağın eziyetinin keyfini tek başıma çıkaracağım."

"Kurbanı gizlice alacağım. Mürettebatın geri kalanı için... Geride iz bile bırakmadan kaybolacak. Bu gemide bol miktarda karanlık köşe var. Ha, bir şey daha..." {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Bu ziyafete sen davetli değilsin. Sunduğun adağın eziyetinin keyfini tek başıma çıkaracağım."
